doc.title: Abenteuer Korsika
doc.plot: Like the Corsican hiking path GR20 the tour starts near Calvi in the northwestern part of the Island. It ends in Porto Vecchio in the southeast. Two mountain bikers cross the Island on lonely mountain roads and hiking paths. Corsica is a mountain range in the sea. A few kilometers after the coastline the mountains reach an altitude of over 2700 meters (8900 feet). Compared to the Alps, the trails in Corsica are less developed and the scenery is dominated by a wild vegetation. The diversity with silent bays, endless beaches and breathtaking cliff lines on the one hand and overwhelming forests or rough mountains on the other, makes Corsica to a unique place in the Mediterranean region.
